## IMGUI.setTheme() method

Merges given theme settings with `DEFAULT_THEME` and resets theme stack.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setTheme(theme: Partial<GUITheme>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | <code>Partial&lt;GUITheme&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
